Thank you for filling out the response card on Sunday and taking the next steps of faith. I just wanted to drop you a quick note and let you know we are praying for you.

You are not alone in your faith journey and we would love to come alongside you and help you with whatever we can to help you connect to Christ. If you need extra prayer, help getting more connected in the church, or just someone to talk to, please don't hesitate to reply. We are praying for you in this area of your life.
